translations: n.奖学金；助学金；财务处（bursary 的复数）

phrs.translation: 科学与艺术奖学金, 工程助理

sentences.sentence: Individual colleges may offer bursaries to those from low-income families.
sentences.translation: 私立学院会给低收入家庭提供奖学金。

sentences.sentence: This in turn can foster charitable activities, from bursaries and grants to apprenticeships.
sentences.translation: 这进而也会促进从奖助学金到实习机会等各种慈善活动。

sentences.sentence: And it will provide generous bursaries to bright people who might otherwise find it difficult to attend university.
sentences.translation: 它还将为天资聪颖的年轻人提供充足的奖学金，让他们得到上大学的机会。
